name: Farfetch Limited
description: Farfetch Limited is a global technology platform that connects consumers with luxury fashion items from boutiques and brands around the world. Founded in 2008 by José Neves, Farfetch aims to revolutionize the luxury retail experience by offering a curated selection of products from over 1,300 boutiques and brands in more than 50 countries. The platform features a diverse range of products including clothing, shoes, accessories, and jewelry from renowned designers and emerging labels alike. Farfetch is known for its commitment to authenticity and quality, ensuring that customers receive genuine luxury items. The company has also embraced sustainability initiatives, partnering with various brands to promote responsible fashion. In addition to its marketplace, Farfetch operates a number of proprietary technology solutions for luxury brands, enhancing their e-commerce capabilities. The company continues to expand its offerings and reach through strategic acquisitions, collaborations, and innovative technology solutions, aiming to provide an unparalleled shopping experience and to support the evolving landscape of luxury fashion.

seo.meta_title: Farfetch Limited | Luxury Fashion E-commerce Platform
seo.meta_description: Explore Farfetch Limited, a leading global platform for luxury fashion. Discover curated collections from top brands and boutiques worldwide.

faq.question: What is Farfetch known for?
faq.answer: Farfetch is known for connecting consumers with luxury fashion items from boutiques and brands globally.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Farfetch?
faq.answer: José Neves is the CEO of Farfetch Limited.

faq.question: Where is Farfetch headquartered?
faq.answer: Farfetch is headquartered in London, United Kingdom.

faq.question: What types of products does Farfetch offer?
faq.answer: Farfetch offers clothing, footwear, accessories, and jewelry from luxury brands and boutiques.
